template.template: Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes
template.name: Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes

discovery_rule.name: Cluster CSV File System Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovers Cluster Shared Volume file system names.

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Read Bytes/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Read Bytes/sec",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Read Latency
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Read Latency",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Read Queue Length
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Read Queue Length",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Reads/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Reads/sec",300]

item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Split Reads",300]

item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Split Reads/sec",300]

item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Split Writes",300]

item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Split Writes/sec",300]

item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Volume Pause Count - Disk",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Volume Pause Count - Network
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Volume Pause Count - Network",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Volume Pause Count - Other
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Volume Pause Count - Other",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Volume Pause Count - Total
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Volume Pause Count - Total",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Write Bytes/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Write Bytes/sec",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Write Latency
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Write Latency",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Write Queue Length
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Write Queue Length",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} IO Writes/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\IO Writes/sec",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Read Bytes/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Read Bytes/sec",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Read Latency
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Read Latency",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Read Queue Length
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Read Queue Length",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Reads/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Reads/sec",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Reads Avg. Queue Length
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Reads Avg. Queue Length",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Write Bytes/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Write Bytes/sec",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Write Latency
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Write Latency",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Write Queue Length
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Write Queue Length",300]

item_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Writes/sec
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Writes/sec",300]

item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Writes Avg. Queue Length",300]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Read Bytes/sec",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Read Bytes/sec
trigger_prototype.description: Cluster File System is using redirected IO instead of direct IO.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Reads/sec",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Reads/sec
trigger_prototype.description: Cluster File System is using redirected IO instead of direct IO.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Write Bytes/sec",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Write Bytes/sec
trigger_prototype.description: Cluster File System is using redirected IO instead of direct IO.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV File System({#CSVFS})\Redirected Writes/sec",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV File System {#CSVFS} Redirected Writes/sec
trigger_prototype.description: Cluster File System is using redirected IO instead of direct IO.

discovery_rule.name: Cluster CSV SMB Server Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovers Cluster Shared Volume file system names.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\SMB Server Shares(\\*\{#CSVSMB})\Avg. Data Queue Length",300].last()}>2

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\SMB Server Shares(\\*\{#CSVSMB})\Avg. Read Queue Length",300].last()}>2

trigger_prototype.name: {#CSVSMB} Avg. Write Queue Length

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV Volume Manager({#CSVVM})\Direct IO Failure Redirection",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV Volume Manager {#CSVVM} Direct IO Failure Redirection
trigger_prototype.description: Volume is using redirected IO instead of Direct IO

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV Volume Manager({#CSVVM})\Direct IO Failure Redirection/sec",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV Volume Manager {#CSVVM} Direct IO Failure Redirection/sec
trigger_prototype.description: Volume is using redirected IO instead of Direct IO

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV Volume Manager({#CSVVM})\IO Read/sec - Redirected",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV Volume Manager {#CSVVM} IO Read/sec - Redirected
trigger_prototype.description: Volume is using redirect IO instead of direct IO.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV Volume Manager({#CSVVM})\IO Read Bytes/sec - Redirected",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV Volume Manager {#CSVVM} IO Read Bytes/sec - Redirected
trigger_prototype.description: Volume is using redirect IO instead of direct IO.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV Volume Manager({#CSVVM})\IO Write/sec - Redirected",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV Volume Manager {#CSVVM} IO Write/sec - Redirected
trigger_prototype.description: Volume is using redirect IO instead of direct IO.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows Cluster Shared Volumes:perf_counter["\Cluster CSV Volume Manager({#CSVVM})\IO Write Bytes/sec - Redirected",300].avg(60,0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Cluster CSV Volume Manager {#CSVVM} IO Write Bytes/sec - Redirected
trigger_prototype.description: Volume is using redirect IO instead of direct IO.
